overview: Hairdresser Marta Maria (63) finally has the opportunity to be with Mario, the man she deeply likes. But her insecurities have grown over the years and she undergoes cosmetic treatments to please him, forcing her to neglect her sick mother living in southern Chile. With the support of her clientele, she must choose whether to pursue romantic ideals or reconnect with her family and true self.
title: Decorous Woman
